data.title: St Malo with a local guide
data.meta_description: Tour St Malo with a local guide (Visite Bretagne). Private excursions in English or in a small group, to discover various areas & themes. Hikes, private driver
data.text:
Saint Malo

Saint Malo has considerable assets to satisfy your taste for discoveries as well as relaxing and physical activities, within the ramparts or along the coast. The city can boast a rich history, greatly related to the sea. The art of sailing, the spirit of explorers and corsairs, and the fishing port, exude a touch of adventure on its ramparts and so typical stones.

Some illustrious people grew up or roamed around the city. Saint Malo is a unique place, which is reminded by one of its old mottos : "Neither French, nor Britton, I am from Saint Malo". You could stand by and listen to its stories for a long time, to look into its heart in front of its islets and forts in harmony with the tides. You might wonder that the city had even established a brief Republic!

Book a tour in Saint Malo

Practical information :

Visit is meant to last 2 hours.

Price rates

- Private visit: 120 euros for your own group. Night tours are also possible on demand.

- Visit within a small group: 19 euros per person (free for -8 yo, 15 euros for -18 yo). On Thursdays at 12.30.

For families, we also suggest discovering Saint Malo with a treasure hunt (a treasure to taste!), in the footsteps of famous Malouin corsairs, 1.5 hour. We adapt the tour to the age of children. Price : 120€.

All the light we cannot see : for those who read Anthony Doerr's beautiful book, our tour is designed to discover and imagine the world of Marie-Laure in the streets of Saint Malo.

Some tours concentrate on St Malo during the 2nd world war (occupation, fighting for the liberation).

Special offer Saint-Malo + Mont-Saint-Michel, 2 private visit pack on the same day : 225€.

Special offer Saint-Malo + Dinan, 2 private visit pack on the same day : 210€.

Special offer Saint-Malo + Dinard, 2 private visit pack on the same day : 210€.

On demand it is also possible to extend the tour of intramuros to other areas of St Malo or to the beautiful fishing port of Cancale, famous for its oysters throughout France. By the way you may taste oysters of different types that could not be fresher !

Further strolls or true hikes may be suggested to enjoy beautiful views over the Emerald coast.

It is possible to visit with a private driver, combining touring from the car and walking : other areas of St Malo (St Servan, Paramé, Rothéneuf), along the Emerald Coast or the Rance river, crossing towns...

How to come to Saint-Malo

By car, 70 km away from Rennes, 55 km away from Mont Saint Michel and the gates of Normandy (A84 highway), 15 km away from Dinard (airport with destinations to England), 30 km away from Dinan.

By train: TGV line Paris/Rennes/St Malo. Or byTER train from Rennes or Dol de Bretagne. SNCF time schedule (or here in French for TER trains).

By Keolis bus from/to Mont Saint Michel. 1 bus from Saint Malo to Mont Saint Michel in the morning, 1 bus from Mont Saint Michel to Saint Malo in the afternoon. 22 euros for the round trip.

By boat from Dinard (10 min) or Dinan (2.45 hr).

By Illenoo bus from Rennes (line 8, about 1.35 hr, 6 euros, but few possibilities) or from Dinard / Saint Briac. Illenoo buses link cities and towns in the Ille-et-Vilaine area. You can buy tickets in the bus or at the bus station.

With Tibus buses, to join Dinan (line 10).

With a private driver from your place / accommodation, a train station or an airport. Possibilities for private tours with a driver from St Malo to many places in Brittany (Mont Saint Michel, Dinan, Emerald coast, Rennes, Broceliande forest, Carnac, ...).

Agenda

Jazz à l'étage, jazz festival, from 2023 March, 2nd till 12th, in Saint Malo and Rennes.

La route du rock winter collection, rock and electro concerts, from 2023 March, 6th till 11th

Classique au large, classical music festival, from 2023 April, 27th till May 1st.

Etonnants Voyageurs, the inescapable event about travelling, which takes places every year in Saint Malo. Books, films, photos, opportunities to meet authors. From 2023 May, 27th till 29th.

La Route du Rock, a famous rock&electro music festival, in the fort Saint Père and on a beach in Saint Malo. From 2023 August, 16th till 19th.

Quai des bulles, the comics and image festival. From 2023 October, 27th till 29th.

Transat Quebec - Saint Malo, transatlantic crewed sailing race, every 4 years. Arrival in St Malo. Next departure in July 2024.

La route du Rhum (the rum road); the great road of Saint Malo! Transatlantic solo sailing race. Every 4 years it leaves Saint Malo to reach Guadeloupe. Next departure : in November 2026! Celebrations in St Malo from October.
